ygData.subject: Of guilds and such...
ygData.msgSnippet: First, thanks to everyone who answered my flood of newbie questions - it s nice to have a forum where you re not flamed for being basic.  ^_^ I m starting to
ygData.messageBody:
First, thanks to everyone who answered my flood of newbie questions - it's nice to have a forum where you're not flamed for being basic. ^_^

I'm starting to get a clearer picture of guilds from all these posts. There seem to be big "barshing" guilds centred on slaying (very attractive to teen boys I imagine), some guilds centred on helping others... are there also trade guilds?

Patti
Wuvian wood-elf druid 5, Saryn
(just made her first silk threads... wooHOO)
